Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.input

Class KeyboardInputHandler

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.input.KeyboardInputHandler
public class KeyboardInputHandler extends Object
KeyboardInputHandler is a class responsible for handling keyboard input in the Larry Croft's Adventures game. It sets up key bindings and actions for various game-related controls and interactions.
